entry.tran: 一年一度的;每年一次的
entry.def: A yearly event happens once a year or every year.

example.ex: The seven major industrial countries will have their yearly meeting in London.
example.tran: 7个主要工业国家将在伦敦举行一年一度的会议。

entry.def: You use yearly to describe something such as an amount that relates to a period of one year.

example.ex: In Holland, the government sets a yearly budget for health care.
example.tran: 在荷兰，政府会制定医疗保健部门的年度预算。
